snippet: A suicide bomber walked into the crowded center of Khost City on Monday, killing 19 people and injuring dozens.
abstract: Suicide bomber walks into the crowded center of Khost, Afghanistan, as foreign and Afghan soldiers conduct a joint foot patrol and kills three international service members and 16 Afghan police officers and civilians.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and FAROOQ JAN MANGAL

lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber walked into the crowded center of Khost City on Monday, killing 19 people and injuring dozens.

headline.main: Suicide Bomber on Foot Attacks Joint Patrol in Eastern Afghanistan, Killing 19
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bomber on Foot Attacks Joint Patrol in Eastern Afghanistan, Killing 19
